name: yaml-iframe-preview
description: Split-view YAML preview that streams YAML to a remote iframe, with a local demo.html fallback.

yamlIframePreview.remoteUrl.description: Remote HTTPS URL to embed in the webview iframe. Leave empty to use the bundled src/demo.html.

yamlIframePreview.debounceMs.description: Debounce delay (ms) for sending YAML changes to the iframe.

yamlIframePreview.allowHttp.description: Allow loading the bundled demo over http://localhost when no remote HTTPS URL is set.
